cleaned_text: - a plant whose leaves, flowers or seeds are used to add taste to food, in medicines or for their pleasant smell. [parsley](https://www.oxfordlearnersdictionaries.com/definition/english/parsley), [mint](https://www.oxfordlearnersdictionaries.com/definition/english/mint_1)and [oregano](https://www.oxfordlearnersdictionaries.com/definition/english/oregano)are all herbs. Extra ExamplesTopics - a herb garden - (North American English) an herb garden - Add a teaspoonful of mixed herbs. - Ali recommends taking herbs to facilitate recovery. - Serve cold, garnished with fresh herbs. - The shop sells a large range of herbs and spices.
